hz_allocator_t
typedef struct
hz_allocator_t

Global heap allocator, an instance of this structure is stored internally and is used by the main memory pool. By default hz_allocator_t.mallocfn and hz_allocator_t.freefn are set to stdlib's malloc() and free().

If you want to set a custom internal allocator, use hz_set_custom_allocator as follows:

hz_allocator_t a;
a.mallocfn = (HZMALLOCFN)mymalloc;
a.freefn = (HZFREEFN)myfree;

hz_set_custom_allocator(a);
Variables
mallocfn
HZMALLOCFN mallocfn

Memory allocation function.

freefn
HZFREEFN freefn

Free allocated memory function.

Functions
hz_set_custom_allocator
HZ_API void hz_set_custom_allocator(
hz_allocator_t a
)

Sets the internal allocator to a custom user-provided allocator.

Arguments
a
hz_allocator_t

Custom allocator.
